meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: April 1: St. Mary of Egypt
April 2: St.Titus the Wonderworker
April 3: St. Nicetas the Confessor
April 4: Sts. Joseph the Hymnographer & George of Mount Maleon, in the Peloponnese
April 5: Holy Martyrs Theodulus & Agathopodes
April 6: Saint Eutychius, Archbishop of Constantinople
April 7: Venerable Father George, Bishop of Mitylene
April 8: Holy Apostles Herodion, Agabus, Asyncritus, Rufus, Phlegon, Hermes, and Those with Them
April 9: Holy Martyr Eupsychius
April 10: Martyrs Terence, Pompey & Those with Them
April 10: Holy Hieromartyr Gregory V, Archbishop of Constantinople
April 11: Holy Hieromartyr Antypas, Bishop of Pergamum
April 12: St. Basil the Confessor, Bishop of Parium
April 13: Holy Hieromartyr Artemon
April 14: St. Martin the Confessor, Pope of Rome
April 14: Holy Martyrs Anthony, John and Eustathius, Slain for the Faith in Vilnius of Lithuania
April 15: Holy Apostles Aristarchus, Pudens & Trophimus
April 16: Holy Martyrs Agape, Irene & Chionia
April 17: Holy Hieromartyr Symeon, Bishop of Persia
April 18: Venerable Father John, the Disciple of Saint Gregory the Decapolite
April 19: Venerable Father John of the Ancient Cave
April 20: St. Anastasius, Abbot of Sinai
April 20: Venerable Father Theodore Trichinas
April 21: Holy Hieromartyr Januarius & His Companions
April 22: St. Theodore of Sykeon, Bishop of Anastasiopolis
April 23: Holy & Glorious Great Martyr & Wonder-worker George the Victorious
April 24: Holy Martyr Sabbas the General
April 25: Holy Apostle & Evangelist Mark
April 26: Holy Hieromartyr Basil, Bishop of Amasea
April 26: St. Stephen, Bishop of Perm
April 27: Holy Hieromartyr Symeon, the Kinsman of Christ
April 28: Holy Apostles Jason & Sosipater
April 29: Commemoration of the 9 Holy Martyrs of Cyzicus
April 29: Holy Hierarch Basil of Ostrog
April 30: Holy Apostle James, the Brother of Saint John the Theologian
